org.fridlund.pacman.managers

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.pacman.managers.Manager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GhostManager, SnackManager

    public abstract class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class containing the base methods used by the managers. Also contains protected fields that are likely to be used by every manager in this game.
